name: Stickman Cliff Diving
description:
Get your kicks and jump down the highest and most dangerous cliffs all over the planet!
Perform different jump styles and get rated by the five judges.
Fulfill the requested handicap to qualify for the next jump.

• 8 million people addicted to Stickman Cliff Diving can't be wrong!
• Stickman Cliff Diving reached #1 top paid in several countries. Thank you for your great support!
• From the makers of Stickman Skate BAttle, Stickman Downhill, Stickman Soccer, Stickman Base Jumper, Stickman Basketball, Stickman Ice Hockey and many more

FEATURES:
• Cliffs up to 125 meters high
• Unique gameplay
• Different jump types
• Continue last game
• Bonus points for good or even perfect jumps
• Smoothest stick animations
• Tutorial
• Online scoreboards & achievements

Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possible .

Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games!
